name: The Ones Who Were
description:
The Ones Who Were is a side-scrolling 2D platformer where you deliver letters during a time of war. The beautiful soundtrack features voices from ten other jammers in our site - thank you so much! 

In the game you control the white dove by using the arrow keys or WASD on your keyboard. Up or W = fly higher, Left or A= decelerate, Down or S = dive, Right or D = accelerate. Use headphones for the best audio experience.

This game was made at the Finnish Game Jam Tampere site as a part of Global Game Jam 2020.

#FGJ20 #GGJ20
